name: Meteorology Dictionary : Learn Atmospheric Science
description: Meteorology Dictionary- Terms & Definitions is an app to explore scientific processes and phenomenon of the atmosphere. There are more than 4500 scientific terms classified under 12 broad categories. The app has Categories, Search, Contribute, EduBank, Quiz and more. The app had details about weather processes and climatic conditions.  Categories of Meteorology Dictionary - Learn Atmospheric Science Offline are:-  * Environmental Meteorology * Thermodynamics * Hydrometeorology * Precipitation * Equipment * Geodesy * Maritime Meteorology * Weather Prediction * Atmospheric Chemistry * Scales of Meteorology * Adiabatic Atmosphere and more.  Features of Meteorology Dictionary - Learn Atmospheric Science Offline are:-  * Categories - Get the details of more than 4500 terms falling under 12 categories in a simplified manner. * Search - Add any term in the search box and get relevant information relating to it. * Contribute - If you think, we missed something, please contribute and we will update it. * EduBank - Save your learnings with EduBank. * Quiz - Challenge your knowledge with Quiz.  Check the latest equipment and technology used in the study of Meteorology. Also, learn the terms in an easy and crisp form. Meteorology Dictionary App is all you need to know about earths atmosphere.  We make SMARTY apps, Simple Masterly Approach to Refine Thinking for YOU.
